channel.title: Hugo on wiseturtles's team blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on wiseturtles's team blog

item.title: Setup Hugo Github Pages
item.description: hugo + github pages 搭建 blog。 安装 hugo Mac brew 安装: $ brew install hugo go 命令行安装: $ go get -u github.com/gohugoio/hugo 创建一个静态blog 创建名为 blog 的静态博客 $ hugo new site blog 下载 theme $ git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even $
